title: Fiora skin
body: Now that she got her rework can she have a skin now? It's been 3 years.

replies.body: Yup! She's certainly eligible for a skin now! What did you have in mind? :D

FOR-SA-KEN! FOR-SA-KEN!

PLZZZZZZ <3 <3 <3  \*w\*

^

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/IOiQi1EM-forsaken-fiora-skin-concept
I know, i know  <3 :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=JM8EEreN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-03T04:59:56.998+0000)
>
> Yup! She's certainly eligible for a skin now! What did you have in mind? :D

Traditional Fiora? There a bunch of ideas floating around but I'd KILL to have the old look back or at least a serious skin.
Oh good lord this! I would so much love a traditional skin compared to her new look!
yeah sorry, but they will not do that for certainty, at least not in the traditional sense, they might make a skin where she has her old clothing but it wouldnt be called traditional fiora.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=JM8EEreN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-03T04:59:56.998+0000)
>
> Yup! She's certainly eligible for a skin now! What did you have in mind? :D

A few ideas:
Petite Baguette Fiora (Smacking fools with a huge piece of hard French bread.)
Pool Party Fiora (Her "sword" is a giant skewer/shish kebob) 
Grand Competition Fiora (Dressed as an Olympic-style fencer)
Home Arcade Fiora (Color scheme of the 1980s SIMON electronic game)

>Petite Baguette Fiora (Smacking fools with a huge piece of hard French bread.)

Marauder Fiora, a wandering bandit looking for a worthy opponent.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=JM8EEreN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-03T04:59:56.998+0000)

Pool Party Fiora BAAMM
Chosen or project would be pretty cool. Mebe one kinda like demon blade tryndamere but angelic instead of demonic.
I would like to see a Steel Legion one personally.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=JM8EEreN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-03T04:59:56.998+0000)
>
> Yup! She's certainly eligible for a skin now! What did you have in mind? :D

-The default skin we have now. Many people are attached to it, it's not completely out-of-date or out-of-place like the old Sion default skin, yet it's being cast aside for a new default skin that's entirely in a different direction. Perhaps give it the  "Captain Gangplank" treatment and make it free as part of an event? Or just reverse your stance on the "no more traditional skin" policy and start handling it as a case-by-case situation since one-bill does not fit all?

-PROJECT: Fiora
Yes plz, especially after RUINING my favorite one. (no hate, just salt)

YAY fiora skin!:D I got tired of royqal guard:/ Can we try something like PROJECT:fiora or something though?With the new fiora abilities I can think of alot of orange robotlike abilities that look cool.I got the idea from PROJECT:yasuo,a skin I want bad but currently I'm poorT.T
i was raised to always confess if you do something wrong.

It's about time! 

I would really appreciate a skin that's set apart from the previous ones she has. They are nice, but they sort of blend together, and it's not really exciting to choose between them. (I own all 3 and mostly use Headmistress Fiora for fun.) They just simply lack diversity compared to most other champions.

Any of the themed skins would make us happy Arcade, Arclight, Forsaken, Star Guardian, etc. A little color wouldn't hurt either.
